workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class WorkshopEntityTypesRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<WorkshopEntityType>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopEntityTypesRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<WorkshopEntityType>

    @RestController
 @RequestMapping(path="/internal/entity-types",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=WorkshopEntityType.class)
public class WorkshopEntityTypesRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<WorkshopEntityType>

      • deleteEntityTypeAuthorityPermission

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/authority-permissions/{authorityPermissionId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'AuthorityPermission\', \'put\') and hasPermission(\'WorkshopEntityType\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteEntityTypeAuthorityPermission(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable(name="authorityPermissionId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.Long authorityPermissionId)
        Just removes this EntityType from a given AuthorityPermission.

        An AuthorityPermission without this WorkshopEntityType
